breadCrumbs.text: Choose how to build your EoI

title: Choose how to build your EoI

form.question: You can choose to either enter the information online to build your EOI or upload your own document.
form.question_eoi1: You can build your EoI by entering the necessary information online.
form.question_eoi2: You will also have the option to upload documents as part of this journey.
form.question_eoi3: Alternatively, you can prepare your EoI offline and then upload it.

hint.text: Enter all the information needed to build your EoI and submit to the suppliers.

items.text: Complete and upload document (You cannot upload documents at the moment)

hint.text: Use this option to prepare your EoI offline and then upload it.
